description: The Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4) Revision 11 Ancillary Datasets (data quality indicators, basic demographic characteristics, land and water area, and national identifier grid) provide context for the population count and density rasters found within the Gridded Population of the World Population Collection.

anc_dqi_context.title: Data Quality Indicators - Data Context
anc_dqi_context.description: Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): Data Quality Indicators - Data Context, 30 arc-seconds, 1km resolution
anc_dqi_context.sci:citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University. 2018. Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): Data Quality Indicators, Revision 11. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). https://doi.org/10.7927/H42Z13KG. Accessed 22 Octover 2021.
